name: Disharmony (Demo)
description:
Disharmony is a turn-based role-playing game with elements typically found in rhythm games. It is currently being developed for Windows, and possibly other platforms in the future. In this game, You take control of Tay, as you travel through a fantasy-world/sci-fi world based on music. It's filled with music-related puzzles, characters, references to tons of bands/musical groups, and more. You also have the ability to enter certain characters' dreams and explore their subconscious. The game has a fairly strong emphasis on humour, but the story is fairly serious.
If you wish to support us with the development of this game, check out our Kickstarter-page!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/dasshu/1542592811?ref=826164&token=56841232
